channel.title: Dark Souls RSPS Base Source/Client
channel.description:
Well I've been working on this for a while now and I just don't have the time to do what I want with this project so hopefully someone else will. Here's the development thread:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,664694.msg4443339.html#msg4443339
Lots of changes everything works like dark souls basically except I made it for single player only so there will need to be lots of modifications to make it multi-player.
Source: [URL=http://up.ht/ZqWqCy]DarkSoulsRSPSBaseSource.rar - 14.9 MB[/URL] Client/Cache: [URL=http://up.ht/ZqXlTB]DarkSoulsRSPSBaseClientCache.rar - 74.8 MB[/URL]
this is the only video i have of ingame i havent tooken any pictures because honestly I dont feel like it lol.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cMOOc7sq8bg[/youtube]
If trying to add onto the content and encounter any problems or confusion or cant find somethin just comment below or message me

item.title: Dark Souls RSPS Base Source/Client
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

yomamazz1:

okay i am also new to starting a server this is my first one and im really just learning how i have been trying to create my own private server since i was like 11 but this time i am actually going to go through with it. By any chance do you think you can send me a link to a good tutorial on how to code items, change lvls, etc. I have looked all over and every source and client i download ends up not working because it was made so long ago and i am really trying to figure this shit out. I doubt you have the time so if you don’t mind sending me a link to a good tutorial that would be great and I’d really appreciate it.

Add me on skype c.alexr.

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Souls RSPS Base Source/Client
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

goudont:

haha that’s pretty cool. I didn’t watch the video entirely, but the idea is cool. nice contribution!

Thanks finally one person has something nice to say, i released on rserver and i got a bunch of bad comments saying like why release something nobody will ever use etc. Idk i just was trying to incorporate something different into rsps rather than the normal stuff everybody and their mother does

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Souls RSPS Base Source/Client
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

arceus70:

Deathlypvpz

Yea lol i used it as the base so i already had everything to work off of and to help guide me through some stuff. But its really changed a lot the way leveling and combat works is completely changed, and some new blocking and dodge features when you type f1 and f2
